snippet: Melky Cabrera’s suspension gave further embarrassment to a San Fransisco franchise that has battled the stigma surrounding performance enhancers as much as any over the last decade.
abstract: Doping suspension of San Francisco Giants outfielder Melky Cabrera gives further embarrassment to a franchise that has battled the stigma surrounding performance enhancers as much as any over the last decade.
lead_paragraph: Melky Cabrera’s suspension gave further embarrassment to a San Fransisco franchise that has battled the stigma surrounding performance enhancers as much as any over the last decade.

headline.seo: Cabrera Suspension Again Tarnishes Giants’ Reputation
headline.main: Another Fall From Grace, and Again From a Giant
headline.print_headline: Another Fall From Grace, And Again From a Giant
